action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (red, purple, yellow, and orange) scattered on a white background.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (dark blue, gray, green, light blue) arranged on a white background. The shapes are composed of four squares each, forming various configurations.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (red, purple, yellow, and orange) scattered on a white background.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image touching or overlapping each other?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (dark blue, gray, green, light blue) arranged on a white background. The shapes are composed of four squares each, forming various configurations.
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image touching or overlapping each other? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any yellow shapes in your image?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Are there any yellow shapes in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: How many different colors are present in your image?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: How many different colors are present in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are all the shapes in your image composed of exactly four squares?

ANSWER: Four
QUESTION: Are all the shapes in your image composed of exactly four squares? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image dark blue?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image dark blue? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image red?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image red? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: No
